DOC.brief_summary: In Kuopio University Hospital Department Clinical Neurophysiology design fast EEG electrode , suitable acute emergency use . This study address clinical use acute EEG fast EEG electrode in- hospital patient resuscitate due cardiac arest . After resuscitation patient treat ICU EEG record 24 hour .
